EmailTemplate.name: 11_07_2014 OpenSky Webinar #2.Email_use
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Win a Quadcopter RC Drone | Hyperscaling VDI & IT Operations
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Transforming IT Infrastructure for the Cloud Age
How to Deliver Real-Time Automation & Hyperscale Operations Next Wednesday, join OpenSky's Don McKeith to learn how he helped a Fortune 50 International Health Insurer client develop a ground-up orchestration framework for its virtual infrastructure, and onboard more than 25,000 zero-downtime VDI seats in less than four years.
Join us on November 12 <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-webinar-opensky-orchestration/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=opensky&utm_content=110714> to glean insights for your team directly from Mr. McKeith, including
- The enterprise orchestration framework developed by OpenSky leveraging software-driven control to deliver automated remediation - The specific challenges of scaling a customer-facing, zero-downtime VDI environment - And more!
And win a sweet drone. Register Now <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-webinar-opensky-orchestration/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=opensky&utm_content=110714> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
